    • About Becky Ivins


    Becky began selling real estate in 1977 and in 1979 she started her own brokerage, Movers Real Estate Company. Among her designations is SRES, Senior Real Estate Specialists, and she delights in transitioning seniors from their homes that have become too much to maintain into independent living or assisted living. Her most recent designation is MRP, Military Relocation Professional and with 2 of her 3 sons serving our country as US Army officers, she has firsthand knowledge of how important real estate professionals are when military families buy or sell in our area.

    Becky has hosted her live radio talk show on KTOK since 2006 where she welcomes call-in questions on Saturday mornings at 8:00 on News Radio 1000 KTOK.

    Becky Ivins enjoys the endorsements of Dave Ramsey, Glenn Beck, Barbara Corcoran and John Tesh.

    Beckyâs approaches a real estate transaction with a business attitude and the heart of a social worker. She delights in providing a full service transaction backed by decades of experience and a wealth of knowledge.
